Articles.Content:
When your gaming laptop is getting repaired and upgraded, and you just want to play KSP. OH, THE AGONY;.;!

(I am using my School Netbook, which can barely run chrome!)
Yes, my trusty laptop was getting its motherboard replaced, and I was confined to the *joys* of my old 11 inch. On linux it was fantastic, but still couldn't run anything.

I'm waiting for my 100$ paypal transfer to stop pending so I can by BASPM.

Hurry up!

It's been more than a week!
